// Pivot 0, 0
int palanca_inverted[20] = {
	3, 0,
	0, 2,
	0, 16,
	2, 20,
	7, 20,
	58, 11,
	60, 9,
	60, 5,
	58, 0,
	3, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float palanca_inverted[20] = {
	0.050000f, 0.000000f,
	0.000000f, 0.100000f,
	0.000000f, 0.800000f,
	0.033333f, 1.000000f,
	0.116667f, 1.000000f,
	0.966667f, 0.550000f,
	1.000000f, 0.450000f,
	1.000000f, 0.250000f,
	0.966667f, 0.000000f,
	0.050000f, 0.000000f
};
